turn.1: What is the difference between a private medical college and a government medical college?
turn.2: Hi-Tech Medical College & Hospital, Bhubaneswar Hi-Tech Medical College & Hospital (HMCH)()is a private, profit, self-financing medical institution based in Bhubaneswar, Odisha, India.
turn.3: Are private medical colleges more expensive?
turn.4: Hi-Tech Medical College & Hospital is functioning from 2005 under Utkal University affiliation and recognized by Medical Council Of India.
turn.5: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.6: It is Odisha's first private medical college.
turn.7: Is there a trauma care facility?
turn.8: It has 400 Teaching beds with operation theatres along with 20 intensive care beds with 24hrs with trauma care facility.
turn.10: College offers MBBS and BDS course for duration of 5 years and also Post Graduation for duration of 3 years.
